prompts.prompt: I need to fix a vulnerability in my Angular project identified by Trivy. The vulnerability is related to 'github.com/opencontainers/runc', specifically CVE-2023-27561, which is a high-severity issue. It's a regression of CVE-2019-19921 and involves a volume mount race condition. The affected version is prior to 1.1.5. I need step-by-step instructions to resolve this issue in my project.
